en.chooseservice: Choose from a selection of services to enrich your stay with us.
en.Flowerdes: Order beautiful flowers to your room.
en.Securitydes: Feeling threatened? Order security to your location.
en.Medicinedes: Order your prescribed medications to your room.
en.GiftDes: Get your friend a gift, you can even have it wrapped!
en.Roomdes: Schedule a room for your needs.
en.Devicedes: Request a device for your patient.

ch.chooseservice: 从一系列服务中进行选择，丰富您在我们这里的住宿体验。
ch.Flowerdes: 将美丽的鲜花送到您的房间。
ch.Securitydes: 感觉受到威胁？将安全订单发送到您的位置。
ch.Medicinedes: 将您的处方药物送到您的房间。
ch.GiftDes: 为您的朋友选择一份礼物，甚至可以包装好！
ch.Interpretdes: 满足您的所有语言口译需求。
ch.Sanitationdes: 满足您的所有清洁需求。
ch.Roomdes: 为您的需求安排一个房间。
ch.Devicedes: 为您的患者请求一台设备。
